pageProduct.name: Sustagen Optimum 800g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

SUSTAGEN Optimum is a specialised nutrition supplement designed to provide complete, balanced nutrition at times when dietary intake is inadequate.

Staying healthy and feeling your best depend on keeping active and eating a balanced diet. However, there are times, when we don't eat as well as we should or what we do eat lacks sufficient nutrients, and this can affect our health. Appropriate nutrition is particularly important in times when you aren't at your best, especially during times of illness or when recovering. Living well includes having the energy to do the things you love and SUSTAGEN Optimum is here to help.

To ensure your body is getting the nutrients it needs, simply mix SUSTAGEN Optimum with water for a great tasting nutritionally packed drink with high-quality protein, low in lactose, 27 essential vitamins and minerals plus the added benefits of:
- Probiotics to support gut health
- Immune support with Vitamins A, B6, B12, C, D, folate and minerals copper, selenium, iron, and zinc
- Antioxidants Vitamins C & E
- Dietary fibre to support digestive function

SUSTAGEN OPTIMUM™ is a Food for Special Medical Purpose, specially formulated for medical conditions where nutritional needs cannot be met through diet modification alone. Must be used under the supervision of a healthcare professional.

Suitable For: Vegetarian Diet, Halal Certified

Product Claims: Glycemic Index - © ® of GI symbol, The University of Sydney, used under licence, Contains fibre, Source of Vitamin C, Low Lactose, Source of protein, With probiotics, Source of Vitamin E, Low GI - 44, free from artificial Colours.

Lifestyle Claim: Vegetarian| Halal

Size: 800g

Flavour: VANILLA

Serving Size: 55g

Servings Per Pack: 14

Warnings

USE UNDER MEDICAL SUPERVISION
Not for intravenous use
Intended for Adults

FOOD FOR SPECIAL MEDICAL PURPOSES

Ingredients

Maltodextrin, Milk Proteins (Whey, Potassium Caseinate), Vegetable Oil (High Oleic Sunflower Oil, Sunflower Oil, Rapeseed Oil), Sucrose, Fibres (Fructo-Oligosaccharides, Inulin), Minerals (Calcium Carbonate, Magnesium Chloride, Potassium Hydroxide, Potassium Phosphate, Sodium Hydroxide, Ferrous Sulphate, Zinc Sulphate, Manganese Sulphate, Copper Sulphate, Potassium Iodide, Chromium Chloride, Sodium Selenate, Sodium Molybdate), Food Acid (330, 338), Emulsifier (Soy Lecithin), Choline, Vitamins (E, C, Niacin, Pantothenic Acid, B6, B1, B2, A, Folic Acid, D, K, B12, Biotin), Probiotic Culture (Lactobacillus Paracasei), Flavour, L-Carnitine, Taurine, Sweetener (Acesulfame Potassium).
Contains Milk and Soy.

Contains: Contains Milk and Soy.

Allergen Contains: Milk| Soy

Allergen Free From: Artificial Colours

Directions

To open, remove cap and foil seal. All prepared product should be tightly covered and consumed within 6 hours at room temperature or within 24 hours if refrigerated. Replace cap on tin firmly, contents of tin to be consumed within 4 weeks after opening.

USAGE ADVICE

To open, remove cap and foil seal.
Mix 7 level scoops* with 190ml water or milk (depending on taste).
Stir before serving.  Great chilled or served warm.
Use enclosed scoop.  * 1 x scoop of SUSTAGEN = approx. 8g. 

Note: Do not change proportions.  Follow feeding instructions.
All prepared products should be tightly covered and consumed within 4 hours at room temperature or within 24 hours if refrigerated.

PREPARATION INSTRUCTIONS

Mix 7 level scoops** with 190ml water or milk depending on taste.
** 1 x scoop of SUSTAGEN® OPTIMUM™ = approx. 8g. Scoop included.
Stir before serving. Great chilled or served warm.
All prepared product should be tightly covered and consumed within 6 hours at room temperature or within 24 hours if refrigerated.
Note: Do not change proportions. Follow feeding instructions
Recommended consumption 1-2 serves per day

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store in a cool dry place and use within 4 weeks of opening.
To open, remove cap and foil seal.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Metal cans recycle

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
